author: Wayne Collins
method: Place the pineapple into a cocktail shaker and mash (muddle) with the end of a rolling pin. Add the ginger and mash well again. Add the pineapple juice, falernum syrup, rum, lime juice, vanilla syrup and a handful of ice. Shake well and strain into a glass. Garnish with two fresh pineapple leaves and serve.
